Properties.string: Arm Rocket: Let them feel the full force of your blows

Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer while not Tool:FindFirstChild('Handle') do Tool.ChildAdded:wait() end local Handle = Tool.Handle local Equipped = false local Player; local RightShoulder; local RightArm; local RightWeld; local Torso; local Mouse;
local function Slerp(t, a, b) local om = math.acos(a:Dot(b)) return (math.sin((1-t)*om)/math.sin(om))*a + (math.sin(t*om)/math.sin(om))*b end
local function GetFireCFrame() local from = (Torso.CFrame*CFrame.new(1.5, 0.5, 0)).p local fireDir = (Mouse.Hit.p-from).unit local torsoDir = Torso.CFrame.lookVector -- local theta = math.acos(torsoDir:Dot(fireDir)) if theta > math.pi/2 then fireDir = Slerp((math.pi/2)/theta, torsoDir, fireDir) end return CFrame.new(from, from+fireDir) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) Mouse = mouse Equipped = true -- Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) Torso = Player.Character:FindFirstChild('Torso') if not Torso then return end RightArm = Player.Character:FindFirstChild('Right Arm') if not RightArm then return end RightShoulder = Torso:FindFirstChild('Right Shoulder') if not RightShoulder then return end -- local LastFireTime = 0 mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if tick()-LastFireTime < 1.4 then return end LastFireTime = tick() -- Handle.FireSound:Play() -- local fireHeading = GetFireCFrame() local Rocket = Instance.new('Part') Rocket.FormFactor = 'Custom' Rocket.Size = Vector3.new(0.5,2,0.5) Rocket.CanCollide = false local Mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh', Rocket) Mesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=31601976' Mesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=31601599' local ExplodeSound = Instance.new('Sound', Rocket) ExplodeSound.Name = 'ExplodeSound' ExplodeSound.SoundId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=81116747' local SwooshSound = Instance.new('Sound', Rocket) SwooshSound.Name = 'SwooshSound' SwooshSound.SoundId = 'rbxasset://sounds/Rocket whoosh 01.wav' local Go = Instance.new('BodyVelocity', Rocket) Go.maxForce = Vector3.new(100000,100000,100000) Go.velocity = fireHeading.lookVector*120 -- Rocket.CFrame = fireHeading*CFrame.new(0,0,-2)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) -- local sc = script.RocketScript:Clone() sc.creator.Value = Player sc.Parent = Rocket sc.Disabled = false -- Rocket.Parent = game.Workspace -- Handle.Transparency = 1 RightArm.Transparency = 1 for i = 1,15 do wait() local trans = 1-i/15 Handle.Transparency = trans RightArm.Transparency = trans end Handle.Transparency = 0 RightArm.Transparency = 0 end) -- RightShoulder.Part1 = nil RightWeld = Instance.new('Motor', Torso) RightWeld.Part0 = Torso RightWeld.Part1 = RightArm -- while Equipped do local timeSinceLastFire = (tick()-LastFireTime) local DesiredArmCF; if timeSinceLastFire > 1.4 then local fire = GetFireCFrame() DesiredArmCF = fire*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0)*CFrame.new(0,-0.5,0) elseif timeSinceLastFire > 1.0 then local frac = (timeSinceLastFire-1.0)/0.4 local from = (Torso.CFrame*CFrame.new(1.5, 0.5, 0)).p local to = (Torso.CFrame* CFrame.new(1.5, 0.5, 0)* CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2*frac, 0)* CFrame.new(1.5, 0, 0)).p local dirCur = (to-from).unit local dirWant = GetFireCFrame().lookVector local dir = Slerp(frac, dirCur, dirWant) DesiredArmCF = CFrame.new(from, from+dir)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0)*CFrame.new(0,-0.5,0) else local frac = timeSinceLastFire/1.0 local from = (Torso.CFrame*CFrame.new(1.5*frac, 0.5, 0)).p local to = (Torso.CFrame*CFrame.new(3, 0, 0)).p DesiredArmCF = CFrame.new(from, to)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0)*CFrame.new(0,-0.5,0) end local newC1 = DesiredArmCF:inverse()*Torso.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(0,0,math.pi/2) RightWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() RightWeld.C1 = newC1 -- wait() end end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function(mouse) Equipped = false if RightShoulder then RightWeld:Destroy() RightWeld = nil RightShoulder.Part1 = RightArm RightShoulder = nil end end)

local BLAST_RADIUS = 7
local Rocket = script.Parent local StartAt = Rocket.Position
--make sure we go away if all else fails game.Debris:AddItem(Rocket, 20)
--wait for the creator while not script:FindFirstChild('creator') do script.ChildAdded:wait() end while not script.creator.Value do script.creator.Changed:wait() end local Creator = script.creator.Value
--ontouched Rocket.Touched:connect(function(part) local hum = (part.Parent or game):FindFirstChild('Humanoid') hum = hum or ((part.Parent or game).Parent or game):FindFirstChild('Humanoid') -- if hum then --first see if it's us if game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hum.Parent) == Creator then return --don't explode on ourself end
--we have a direct hit of a humanoid, kill it --first tag: if script:FindFirstChild('creator') then local tag = script.creator:Clone() tag.Parent = hum game.Debris:AddItem(tag, 2) end --then damage hum:TakeDamage(hum.MaxHealth)
elseif not part.CanCollide then --not cancollide, don't explode return end --get rid of the rocket Rocket.Anchored = true Rocket.CanCollide = false Rocket.Transparency = 1
--make an explosion local exp = Instance.new('Explosion') exp.Position = Rocket.Position exp.BlastPressure = 0 exp.BlastRadius = BLAST_RADIUS
--set up damage local hasHitMap = {} exp.Hit:connect(function(hit, radius) --did we hit a humanoid? local hum2 = (hit.Parent or game):FindFirstChild('Humanoid') hum2 = hum2 or ((hit.Parent or game).Parent or game):FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hum2 and not hasHitMap[hum2] then --mark it hasHitMap[hum2] = true
--calculate how much damage to do local damageFrac = radius/BLAST_RADIUS damageFrac = 1 - damageFrac*damageFrac
--tag them if script:FindFirstChild('creator') then local tag = script.creator:Clone() tag.Parent = hum2 game.Debris:AddItem(tag, 2) end
--do the damage hum2:TakeDamage(50*damageFrac) end end)
--let it fly exp.Parent = game.Workspace
--give it a chance to fly, and then get rid of us wait(1) Rocket:Destroy() end)
wait(10) Rocket:Destroy()
